Message.En:
In the Volden Large Tunnels, an army of Wights
with the title of summoner is summoning enemies.
The White Knight Order has deployed a unit to
investigate the situation. Captain Gerd has deemed
early intervention essential, and a request for
assistance has been delivered to the Arisen. Hurry
and eliminate the group of summoners, and make
your way inside the sealed magical wall.
Message.Jp:
ボルド大坑道にて召喚士の名を持つワイトの軍勢が
魔物を呼び寄せている
白衛騎士団が部隊を投じて調査にあたっていたが
早期の対処が必須とゲルト団長が判断
覚者への協力要請が伝えられた
召喚士群を至急全滅させ、封印せし魔壁内部へ急げ

Message.En:
Defeat the summoner's forces and prevent their
expansion (4 locations remaining).
Message.Jp: 召喚士の軍勢を全滅させ、勢力拡大を阻止せよ（残り４箇所）

Message.En:
Defeat the summoner's army and prevent their
expansion (3 remaining)
Message.Jp: 召喚士の軍勢を全滅させ、勢力拡大を阻止せよ（残り３箇所）

Message.En:
Defeat the summoner's army and prevent their
expansion (2 remaining)
Message.Jp: 召喚士の軍勢を全滅させ、勢力拡大を阻止せよ（残り２箇所）

Message.En:
Defeat the summoner's army and prevent their
expansion (1 remaining)
Message.Jp: 召喚士の軍勢を全滅させ、勢力拡大を阻止せよ（残り１箇所）
カースドラゴンを討伐せよ

Message.En: The Demon of Darkness Awakens (Result Reward)
Message.Jp: 目覚めし闇の魔物《リザルト報酬》

Message.En:
The battle with the Summoner Wights in the Volden
Large Tunnels continues.
The power and skills of each Arisen is the key to
victory.
It is essential to adapt to the situation.
Message.Jp:
ボルド大坑道での召喚士ワイトとの戦闘は続いている
覚者一人一人の戦力の配分が勝利への鍵である
その場に合わせた対応が不可欠だ
